```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
kPen <- penguins |> 
  group_by(species, island) |> 
  summarize(mean_mass = mean(body_mass_g, na.rm = TRUE)) |> 
  kable(col.names=c("Species", "Island", "Body mass (g)")) |> 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = FALSE)

typeof(kPen)
class(kPen)
```
